onboarding_welcome.title: Welcome aboard!
onboarding_welcome.subtitle: We are very excited to have you with us, let’s get started.

onboarding.agreeToTerms: By continuing, I agree to Crunch’s Terms of service and Privacy Policy.

onboarding.signInCTA: Please enter your phone number to log in again!
